column5: Saturday there is a tourney on Little lake and Glouster Pool (Port Severn),Sunday there is one on Couch (Orrilla.) Just an FYI For those looking to fish and dont want to get stuck in launch line ups.
Thanks for the heads up!  We're taking the canoe out for a test drive on a bigger lake than we usually try, so this is great info!  The last place I want to be is on a lake with a tourney!!
And which one will you be on???  Maureen
Also Sugog there is 2 tournaments on Sat and Sun.
Awww crap...LOL.  That's where I was planning on going in the Canoe.  Hmmm....gotta think of plan B.....
thanks for the head up, I'll stay off Couch, the last thing I want is all these pro's fishing my spots
Hey Cliff...try Deer Rock lake.....up highway 41 South of Kaladar... lotsa Pike and Bass...not too much traffic at all....very quiet place.

Who`s running tourneys on Scugog this weekend? there was one last Saturday and again on Wednesday,I thought and hoping the Scugog tourney`s were done for the year. I was kinda hoping to get out this weekend to try a couple of spots a 100 bass boats flying around the lake might mess that up.
Top Bass is holding the event. My buddy and I will be there with the rest of them at the starting line.
Thanks I guess I will change my plans hey you tourney guys won`t mind if I chuck musky lures around you will ya.
Not at all.LOL   Mo Im on Glouster Saturday and Couch Sunday.Weigh ins are at 3pm
Not at all.LOL   Mo Im on Glouster Saturday and Couch Sunday.Weigh ins are at 3pm
I plan on tooting around in my boat on Saturday and entering the sunday one.
Thanks for the heads up on this one.  A quick visit to their website shows winnings are based on 120 boats entering.  Think I'll skip the bog this weekend!!!
Which one?
Top Bass, I will have my binoculars out spotting for holes and lures.
Note to self, watch for guy with binos and sneaky grin. LOL  As far as I am aware, I don't think you can enter this late. I could be wrong.  As for lures make them up like Roy did, they work great  .

From what I was told there was lots of space left and Top Bass you can enter the day of at the launch. Not 100 percent sure if I will enter on Saturday but I am about 90 percent sure I will be out on the lake to see where people fish. I am new to scugog and wanted to see where everyone goes.
Besides I will be in disguise so you won't know its me.
Well if you enter good luck, sorry can't help with good spots gotta keep them to myself you know how it is. I am sure you will see where everyone goes.
GO PINK. I hear thats the Nancy thing to do there.LOL
Where is the launch area? Just wanna stay out of the way on saturday morning. I know what its like launching 100 boats while everyone is still half asleep.
Port Perry is where evreyone lauches at.
